ingredients.description: Baking Powder, Double Acting, Davis (8.1 oz = 230 g)
Baking Soda, Arm & Hammer (16 oz = 454 g)
ingredients.shelf_life: 6 months in pantry; replace monthly if used in fridge or freezer to absord odors and don't cook with that

ingredients.description: Yeast, Active Dry, Fleischmann's (3 ct, 0.25 oz = 7 g = 2.25 tsp each)
ingredients.shelf_life: Unopened: 2 years in pantry; Opened: 4 months in fridge; 6 months in freezer
